title: Summer Wolf
description: Summer Reign, a teenaged girl who lives in Chicago, Illinois leads a lonely existence. Her father disappeared and her mother is never home. One phone call changed her life, as she knew it. She found out her entire life had been a lie. She was then carted off to Cherokee, North Carolina where she learned she had powers beyond belief. When she decides to run away from her new found powers, she learns she will have to face her demons. Would her choice to run, end with her getting raped, killed or both? Befriended, by a wolf named Eagle, who seemed too intelligent for your run of the mill wolf. Summer can't help but wonder if there isn't more to this animal. Her journey takes her to Waterford Castle in Ireland, the homeland of her mother. There she is set out for revenge of the one person who she blames for ruining her life for sixteen years. Thank You To Paige Carter - Model
author: Leesia Champion
